articles.description: The industry is currently considering its options and is hoping to approach the government for talks on reconsidering the tax rate.
articles.content: Crypto industry is looking for a dialogue with the Government as the Goods and Services Tax (GST) Council may now put cryptocurrencies and related services under the 28 percent tax slab. The Governme… [+4973 chars]

articles.author: ETMarkets.com
articles.title: Prudent Corporate IPO subscribed 57% on Day 2 - Economic Times
articles.description: The bidding was majorly driven by retail bidders, whose portion was subscribed 81 per cent. Employee quota was subscribed 40 per cent, whereas HNI quota received only three per cent bids so far. The institutional quota did not see any bids yet.
articles.content: New Delhi: The Rs 538.61 crore initial public offering (IPO) of Prudent Corporate Advisory Services received a muted response from investors as the issue received 57 per cent bids so far on the secon… [+2126 chars]

articles.title: After Elon Musk's Taj Mahal Tweet, Mother Maye Shares Throwback Pictures Of Monument - NDTV
articles.description: The spectacular architecture and design of the Taj Mahal arecelebrated across the world, andthere's no dearth of praises for this ancient monument. Now, there's a link that we've found between Elon Musk and the Taj Mahal
